overview: Mies 421 is a slideshow of black and white photographs that Taniguchi took when visiting Mies van der Rohe’s Barcelona Pavilion. With each click, there is a sudden change of viewpoint and surface detail. The accelerating soundtrack and ambiguous narrative create what Taniguchi describes as an “accidental horror film”, in which the modernist pavilion becomes the stage for an invisible threat.
title: Mies 421
